explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques, specifically deep reinforcement learning and transformer-based models, for portfolio selection.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions using deep reinforcement learning for portfolio selection.
explanations.deep learning: The paper introduces a deep learning framework (DEEPCLAIR) for portfolio selection, utilizing transformer-based models.
explanations.neural network: The transformer-based model mentioned in the paper is a type of neural network.
explanations.representation learning: The paper involves learning representations of market data for forecasting, which is a form of representation learning.
explanations.transformer: The paper uses a transformer-based time-series forecasting model.
explanations.attention mechanism: Transformers utilize attention mechanisms, which are implicitly part of the model used in the paper.
explanations.unsupervised pre-train: The paper mentions pre-training the time-series model on market data, which can be considered a form of unsupervised pre-training.
